meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Neil Landau Les Raff Linda Mossman Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #893.

td.p: Neil Landau, an engineer from El Cerrito, California
Les Raff, a physician from Arlington Heights, Illinois
Linda Mossman, a substitute teacher from Elizaville, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,601)

tr.td: FIRST LINES
TRANSPORTATION
SPORTS TRIVIA
BIRDS
POTENT POTABLES
CELEBRITY SPELLING
